text: Hilmar Otto Thate (17 April 1931 – 14 September 2016) was a German actor. He appeared in 40 movies and television shows between 1955 and 2016. Thate was born in Dölau, Saalkreis, Germany. He was known for his role as Robert Krohn in the 1982 movie Veronika Voss. Thate died on 14 September 2016 in Berlin at the age of 85. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:People from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Hilmar Thate
